title: Bébés, Luxembourg Gardens
medium: etching and drypoint printed in black ink on heavy, wove paper
provenance_text:
James Abbott McNeill Whistler [1834-1903], Paris, France and London, England. Charles J. Rosenbloom [1898-1973], Pittsburgh, PA (Lugt Suppl. 633b), by October 1969 until April 1, 1973 [1]; his bequest to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1974.

Notes:
[1]. The work was exhibited in "Watercolors, Drawings, and Prints from the Collection of Charles J. Rosenbloom" held at the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, October 1969-January 1970.

Under review by CGK
